## Examples

### Bubbles

Using the example from [https://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4063269](https://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4063269) requires creating the `svg` element in d3 instead of HTML as follows:

```{js}
var svg = d3.select(r2.root).append("svg")
  .attr("width", r2.width)
  .attr("height", r2.height)
  .attr("font-family", "sans-serif")
  .attr("font-size", "10")
  .attr("text-anchor", "middle");
```

and also replacing `d3.csv` with `r2.d3` to render:

```{r}
library(r2d3)
render(
  read.csv(system.file("samples/flare.csv", package = "r2d3")),
  system.file("samples/bubbles.js", package = "r2d3"),
  version = "4.13.0"
)
```
